title: NO MORE LIES! | Guests: Steven Crowder & Herschel Walker | 6/4/20
description:
Glenn has absolutely had it with the lies and hypocrisy, and James Mattis was the breaking point. Suddenly, these leaders who panicked about the coronavirus are now out marching with protesters. Trump is not the problem! Meanwhile, Obama and Bush are lecturing us on unity and systemic racism. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz talked to protesters and found that many actually justified violence. Will Minnesota AG Keith Ellison overcharge George Floyd’s killer? BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder discusses what he saw in the aftermath of the Dallas riots. Former football star Herschel Walker has had enough of Democrats pushing division. He gives his thoughts on the riots, Drew Brees’ apology, and what we can do to heal our nation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
